pageProduct.name: Pears Oil Clear Soap 100g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Pears Pure & Gentle Soap With Lemon Flower Extract gently moisturizes the skin to keep it smooth. It is enriched with Lemon Flower Extracts.

Pears, a soap with over 200 years of heritage, is prepared with a unique process of moulding & then matured until it reaches pure transparency.

Each bar is still made with natural oils & filtered for purity. It is then finished by hand & checked by eye. So what you get in the end is a beautiful pure & gentle soap.

Size: 100g

Scent: Lemon Flower

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs flush thoroughly with water. Do not use on inflamed or broken skin. In the unlikely event of skin irritation, discontinue use immediately.

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Sorbitol, Sodium Palm Kernelate, Sodium Palmate, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, PEG-4, Sodium Laurate, Sodium Castorate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Parfum (Perfume), Sodium Chloride, Sodium Sulfate, Sodium Metabisulfite, Tetrasodium Etidronate, Lauryl Alcohol, Glycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, BHT, Citrus Medica Limonum Extract, Sodium 0-Phenylphenate, Alpha-Isomethyl lonone, Benzyl Salicylate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool, CI 74260.

Directions

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
